content: What privileges do you need to ping @**channel**? I'm asking, because I created a small private channel, but I don't have the rights to ping @**channel** in it. (I am a Zulip moderator, but not a Zulip admin.)
Ah, looking here it seems that this is restricted for channels with at least 15 users, which this channel (barely) passed.
It might be reasonable if channel creators (of private channels?) can always perform that ping.
We have now changed the settings of our Zulip instance so that moderators can also do large pings, so my issue is now solved.
